channel.title: Adding Shop..?
channel.description:
Hello People <3
Okay i've read the Tuts. and i jus tmade this server 2 days ago, and those tuts, are VERY hard to understand because i'm not a great coder, so i was wondering if one of you great coders can tell me how to add a shop, everyone says it's soooo simple, just read the tut. i don't get what the tut says :( Thank you Ashley :)

[center][i]I can help.

Then complete the information, coordinates etc.
Then in your client.
You need to add a.

Wanneshop

Search for one then have a look at the examples.[/i][/center]
